title: S&P; Global (SPGI) Q3 2023 Earnings Call Transcript - The Motley Fool
summary: S&P Global held its third quarter earnings call, reporting 11% revenue growth, new product launches, and a focus on sustainability and energy transition. Strategic emphasis on private markets and growth in sustainability and energy transition revenue were highlighted. Progress on cost and revenue synergies post-IHS Markit merger was also discussed.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 518210 - Data Processing, Hosting, and Related Services, 522298 - All Other Nondepository Credit Intermediation, 523930 - Investment Advice, 541360 - Geophysical Surveying and Mapping Services
